title: New: Luca Chesney – Maria, Promise Me The Next Life
body:
Absolutely head over heels for this debut track from NY’s **Luca Chesney**.

Swirling gloriously throughout it’s three minutes, it’s at times devastatingly uncompromising, truly carving out a niche of it’s own, which is increasingly rare nowadays. In truth, my feeble words do it little justice – just check it out. Maria, Promise Me The Next Life.

In truth, my feeble words do it little justice – just check it out. Maria, Promise Me The Next \[…\]
